ack.p: We received helpful comments on this work from seminar participants in the Department of Demography at the University of California, Berkeley. Magali Barbieri helped us find the relevant data for Europe. Yi Zhou helped with the Chinese data. Peter Choi sent us data for South Korea. Sam Preston, John Wilmoth, Barry Schwartz, and two anonymous referees provided valuable suggestions on earlier drafts. Casey Breen helped make the replication code readable and reproducible. We thank them all. J.R.G. is supported by National Institute of Aging Grant R01AG058940. J.R.G. and R.D.L. are supported by the University of California Berkeley Center on the Economics and Demography of Aging (National Institute of Aging 5P30AG012839) and the Berkeley Population Center (National Institute for Child Health and Human Development P2CHD072964).
